name: THE LIVINGSTON GROUP ON BEHALF OF RARE ELEMENT RESOURCES
sampleDescriptions: To provide funding for the completion of a study to assess the economic feasibility of mining a high-grade rare earth mineral deposit with advanced processing and separation technology.
To provide funding for the completion of a study to assess the economic feasibility of mining a high-grade rare earth mineral deposit with advanced processing and separation technology.

Encouraging the completion of required steps for the release of matched funding to build a processing and separation demonstration facility. To provide funding for the completion of a feasibility stud
